snippet: Lindsey Vonn had her first day of downhill training in Copper Mountain, Colo., taking five runs through a two-mile course.
abstract: Lindsey Vonn has her first day of downhill training follwing recovery from injuries sustained at world championships year in February.
lead_paragraph: Lindsey Vonn had her first day of downhill training in Copper Mountain, Colo., taking five runs through a two-mile course.

headline.main: Vonn Back on Mountain After Injury
